WITCH:
I’m a very strange girl, but I’m
hardly as young as I once was.
I - ah - I was not referring to you.
But I do want a word with you. I
want to make a bargain with you.
All right, get on with it.
Well, Mistress Martha has sent me to
induce you to go, but I don’t want to
do anything of the kind. I want you
to stay. So if you’ll fall in with
my scheme. I’ll do all I can to
prevent their turning you out.
And what’s your scheme?
You have the wonderful gift of
living without food.
Yes, I have that gift.
For the last fifty years, I’ve been
trying to master that secret, but in
vain. It’s true I've brought myself
down to one hard-boiled egg and a
cupful of soup per day, but I find
even that a great drain on my resources.
Now, if you'll teach me how to live
comfortably - I don’t say luxuriously,
but comfortably - on nothing at all.
I'll give you - yes. I'll give you a
guinea!
